title: Perilous Love
description:
Amo's debut novella, Perilous Love.
What happens when you’re the daughter of the most feared assassin known to mankind? After having to flee her family home in New Zealand at age eight, Alaina Vance knows very little about her parents. She now lives an uncomplicated life—in her final year of college—with her hardest decision being what drink to order. That is until she meets Zane Mathews. The sexy and domineering president of Sinful Souls MC. Her whole world as she knew it starts to flip before her very eyes. As everything that she thought she knew was really nothing at all.
author: Amo Jones
